problem.title: CheckPoint: A varying force
problem.script: m=random.choice([3,5,12]) cofb=random.choice([2,4,8]) cofc=random.choice([6,9,12]) mv=(65* cofb/4)+(19* cofc/3)
problem.p: An object experiences a time-dependent force \( F(t) = $cofb t^3 + $cofc t^2 \)(all coefficients have appropriate SI units). What is the change in momentum \(\Delta p \) of the object between t = 2.0 s and t = 3.0 s?
